markdownRemark.html:
Good morning! Okay, so I think I‚Äôm somewhat caught up on sleep here; most of my body really wanted to go for a run this morning, just not my Achilles ü§¶‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è Got Dawa out on a short run and biked to the store to get a few things though, so we‚Äôre good to go for a while here.

Lol, sort of.

Mentally and emotionally I‚Äôm not really caught up; with everything going on, I‚Äôve had three breakdowns already today and it‚Äôs not even noon ‚Ä¶ and they weren‚Äôt even over coding (eugh, jk.) Almost over coding, though, I‚Äôve been in Express/Pug land for long enough I‚Äôve forgotten how to do simple things in JS/React ‚Ä¶

// Uhh, so, got somewhat further with that, listened to some tech podcasts, and due to unforseen circumstances, I‚Äôm going to call it an evening and make an effort to establish the early rise that I so prided myself on not so long ago. What a time to be alive.

Best wishes. ~g

frontmatter.title: Fog Of War
frontmatter.description: In which Gareth tries to perform simple front-end tasks, lol ...
